items.content_html: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js‚Äîno third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.

items.content_html: ChatCraft is a lightweight, user-friendly chatbot interface designed to showcase the power of Superflex for frontend development and Ollama for running efficient, open-source AI models locally. Whether you're building a simple conversational agent or exploring AI-powered interfaces, ChatCraft provides a seamless and modern experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
